name: Through the Omni Light
description:
This game is about a kid trying to leave the state of coma, trying to break though the ethereal plane where he is into, by finding out, throughout the game, different things that makes him understand that he is not an entity, he is a kid that has to come back to his body.
The gameplay develops in different scenes that are going to construct the kid’s personality and memory again. As far as we go on, the game becomes more clear, colorful and entire. Clarity is reached when he finally reaches de real world again and wakes up.

/*--------------------------------------------------------*/

TO MOVE:
A left
D right
W,S to interact

/*--------------------------------------------------------*/
